poemsDataJson.list_full: わが庵(いほ)は 都(みやこ)のたつみ しかぞ住(す)む 世(よ)をうぢ山(やま)と 人(ひと)はいふなり
poemsDataJson.list_full_en: My lowly hut is//Southeast from the capital.//Thus I choose to live.//And the world in which I live//Men have named a "Mount of Gloom".
poemsDataJson.list_full_romaji: Waga io wa|Miyako no tatsumi|Shika zo sumu|Yo o Uji-yama to|Hito wa iu nari
poemsDataJson.list_torifuda: よをうちやまと ひとはいふなり
poemsDataJson.author: 喜撰法師(きせんほうし)
poemsDataJson.poem_theme: 心静かに住む、宇治での隠棲
